summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Oyun Yazarlari gaming review forum. Backend APIs working excellently (94.4% success rate) with all CRUD operations, authentication, and AI features functional. Frontend has good basic functionality but some integration issues with review display and session management.

integration_issues.issue: Reviews created successfully via API but not displaying on homepage
User sessions appear to expire or get lost during navigation
AI assistant and word explanation features need verification in frontend

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix review display integration issue - reviews are created in backend but not showing on frontend homepage. Investigate frontend API calls for fetching reviews and ensure proper data flow. Also check session management for user authentication persistence.
